Incidents at Work of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UAB EPAM SISTEMOS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (hereinafter – the Procedure) defines the procedure for reporting incidents by employees, their investigation and registration.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Incident\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – an event related to work during which the employee’s health is not damaged.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.\\tFor the purposes of this Procedure, the term “incident” also includes the following definitions:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.1.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"dangerous actions\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – means any noticed unsafe actions of employees which may lead to an accident;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.2.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"dangerous working conditions\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – means physical condition of working environment which does not meet the established safety requirements and in which there is a high risk of an accident;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.3.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"near miss \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– means incidents, means incidents that fortunately (by a happy chance) did not result in injury, but there could have been the potential of an accident;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.4.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"injury\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – means a minor injury to health where, upon the provision of first aid, there is no risk to the employee’s health and the work can be continued.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.\\tEvery employee in the company is encouraged to work safely and eliminate hazards as soon as they are discovered in the workplace. If there is no possibility of eliminating the hazard, the line manager must be informed immediately and additional precautions taken (fencing of the danger zone, placing of warning signs, etc.).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"II. INCIDENT REPORTS\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.\\tEach employee of the company must immediately report to the line manager, orally or in writing (by filling in the established form, Annex 1), on incidents occurring at work, as well as on his own and other employees’ dangerous actions, dangerous conditions, successfully avoided accidents, any injuries, failures of equipment and devices which may directly or indirectly lead to accidents at work. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.\\tIncident reports are important and useful information that will help the company’s responsible persons to take timely measures as soon as possible to address the causes of similar events and protect the health and life of workers. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"III. INVESTIGATION OF INCIDENTS\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7.\\tThe investigation of incidents shall be started at the initiative of persons (heads of departments) or occupational safety and health specialists authorised by the employer, when they are informed about an incident by the company’s employee or when they notice a case which falls within the definition of an incident.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"8.\\tAn investigation commission shall be formed for the investigation of an incident at work, which shall include persons authorised by the employer (heads of divisions), employees’ representatives for safety and health. An occupational safety and health specialist shall be involved in the investigation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9.\\tThe incident investigation commission must investigate the incident within \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10 business days\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" from the beginning of the incident or from the receipt of the report on the incident that has occurred.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.\\tEvery employee who has witnessed a dangerous act, dangerous working conditions, a potential possibility of a dangerous accident or has suffered a minor injury to health must submit a written explanation to the investigation commission.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11.\\tThe incident at work investigation commission shall investigate the circumstances and causes of the incident, determine the type of the incident and draw up a free-form report on the incident at work (Annex 2) specifying possible preventive measures to avoid future incidents or accidents at work.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"12.\\tWhen an incident is investigated, the development and implementation of prevention measures (if applicable) shall be organised. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IV. REGISTRATION OF INCIDENTS\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"13.\\tIncidents in the company shall be registered in the register of accidents at work investigation reports and investigation material shall be stored in the company in compliance with the time period set for the safekeeping of documents by the Office of the Chief Archivist of
